topic.title: Multi-Language Documentation
topic.shortdesc: Build documentation in multiple languages with parallel execution.

body.p: The examples/multi-language project demonstrates how to build localized documentation efficiently.

section.title: Quick Start
section.codeblock:
cd examples/multi-language
# Build all languages (parallel) ./gradlew buildAll
# Build specific language ./gradlew buildEn ./gradlew buildFr ./gradlew buildDe

section.title: Project Structure
section.codeblock: multi-language/ ├── build.gradle.kts ├── content/ │ ├── en/ # English content │ │ ├── guide.ditamap │ │ └── topics/ │ ├── fr/ # French content │ │ ├── guide.ditamap │ │ └── topics/ │ └── de/ # German content │ ├── guide.ditamap │ └── topics/ └── shared/ └── images/ # Shared images across languages

section.title: Parallel Execution
section.p: This allows all language builds to run simultaneously, significantly reducing total build time.
